channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- Adobe Premiere Rush
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- Adobe Premiere Rush

item.title: CVE-2020-9656|2024-08-04T10:34:39.874Z -- adobe -- adobe%20premiere%20rush
item.description: Adobe Premiere Rush versions 1.5.12 and earlier have an out-of-bounds write vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrary code execution .

item.title: CVE-2020-9657|2024-08-04T10:34:39.868Z -- adobe -- adobe%20premiere%20rush
item.description: Adobe Premiere Rush versions 1.5.12 and earlier have an out-of-bounds write vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrary code execution .

item.title: CVE-2020-9655|2024-08-04T10:34:39.883Z -- adobe -- adobe%20premiere%20rush
item.description: Adobe Premiere Rush versions 1.5.12 and earlier have an out-of-bounds read vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrary code execution .

item.title: CVE-2020-9617|2024-08-04T10:34:39.759Z -- adobe -- adobe%20premiere%20rush
item.description: Adobe Premiere Rush versions 1.5.8 and earlier have an out-of-bounds read vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to information disclosure.
